Content: You can go the distance, you can run the mile. You can walk straight through hell with a smile. You can be a hero, you can get the gold. Breakin' all the records they thought never could be broke. Do it for your people, do it for your pride. How you ever gonna know if you never even try? Do it for your country, do it for your name, 'cause there's gon' be a day when you're standing in the Hall of Fame.
Author: The Script
